github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Always add a comment: 'Generated by Copilot'.
In TypeScript always use underscore for private field names.
In TypeScript always use camelCase for public field names.
Always use arrow functions for React components.
Always use functional components for React components.
Always use the latest version of React.
Always use the latest version of TypeScript.
Always use the latest version of Node.js.
Always use the latest version of npm.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Always write commit messages in the conventional commits format. Write an extremely detailed list of the file changes and the reason for the change in the commit message description.
Always add a scope to the commit message.
add a footer with a list of all the files changed in the commit.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Check for adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Ensure that the code is maintainable and easy to understand.
Check for performance optimizations and potential bottlenecks.
Verify that the code is properly tested and has sufficient test coverage.
Review the code for security vulnerabilities and performance issues.
Check for code style and formatting issues.
Ensure that the code is well-documented and follows best practices.
Check for potential bugs and edge cases.

github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Always use Vitest for testing React components.
Use Vitest for testing JavaScript code.
Use React Testing Library for testing React components.
Use Mock Service Worker (MSW) for mocking API requests.
